name: A New Kage
description:
Hi everyone, my name is Ciolo. I am new on this page . In my free time I make  games . Down below you can find information about the games I develop. With your assistance I will be able to work on my projects much more efficient.


The game will start  like this ,in the Fourth Great Shinobi war your parents were killed ,you will work ,fight all around the shinobi world ,you want to make a country of you're own.

For that you will need to get really strong make friends ,allies ,and a bounch of money . Some other countries big or small  will not like that ,just be careful you can die and kill others .

I want to make the option to build you're character , to chose from what country you initial are and from what clan  .

I have big plans for this project ,thank you in advance for support .
